item.title: URLSession router in Swift
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to create a router for managing network requests using URLSession in Swift. We’ll define a base URL, create an enum for routing different API endpoints, and provide a detailed example of how to configure and make requests.
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic

item.title: Working with Dates in Swift
item.description: We will cover the basics of handling dates in Swift, including creating dates, formatting, and manipulating them.
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic

item.title: HealthKit integration in Swift
item.description: HealthKit is a framework provided by Apple that allows us to read and write data to the Health app on Apple devices. This guide demonstrates the basic setup for requesting authorization, reading, and writing HealthKit data.
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic

item.title: Swift API Service Creation
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to create an API service in Swift using URLSession for handling network requests. We’ll walk through the implementation of an APIService class and provide an example of its usage in fetching data asynchronously.
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic

item.title: CoffeeTime
item.description: Find the Best Coffee Spots and Make Plans with Friends!
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic

item.title: Hydra Reminder
item.description: Start your journey to better hydration with Hydra Reminder today!
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic

item.title: Simple Money
item.description: Simple Money is designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind.
item.dc:creator: Milos Malovic
